title: Sampler, August 8, 1837
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: running stitches on plain weave
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased at Mercur sale, cat. #179, Anderson Art Galleries 1928.
dimensions: Frame H x W: 16.8 x 18.1 cm (6 5/8 x 7 1/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Text in black stitching on a natural linen ground. Made at the Cheltenham Female Orphan Asylum.
